title: Shop is black screen since April Fools Skins Release
body: title. anyone else having this problem? I reinstalled too... guess I have to use new client zz{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  There were some store issues overnight, but let me know.  I'm happy to help!
no it was just coincidentally the few hours I was able to play during the week. UNLUCKY. thanks for the reply!! :)
I use the new client, and store is down there too
